description: This dataset contains the street location of specific parking regulations. Refer to NYC.gov and look up the regulation code to get detailed information on the regulations that pertain to a specific street. Fields for location define the street that is being referenced.

metadata.description: This dataset contains the street location of specific parking regulations. Refer to NYC.gov and look up the regulation code to get detailed information on the regulations that pertain to a specific street. Fields for location define the street that is being referenced.

name: Bronx Parking Locations and Regulations
